scripts.install:docfx: nuget install docfx.console -Version 2.36.2 -OutputDirectory docfx && copyfiles docfx/docfx.console*/**/* docfx -u 2 && rimraf docfx/docfx.console*
scripts.prebuild:docs: copyfiles ../README.md docs/docs && replace "docs/" "../" docs/README.md && renamer -f README.md -r quickstart.md docs/* && docfx\tools\docfx.exe metadata docfx.json
